title: [1.13-1.12.2][Better Animals +——更多动物]觉得原版里面动物太单调吗？
author: a13724082134
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a13724082134 于 2019-6-19 14:05 编辑 
[更多动物+]

授权证明





授权证明.png (64.03 KB, 下载次数: 52)

下载附件

2019-4-29 16:04 上传






给你的世界注入新的生命

更好的动物+被设想为一种伙伴模式更好的动物但完全可以自己工作。寻求给你的世界带来新的生命和生物，与类似的MOD相比，它们都具有独特的闪光和美学。增加了许多被动的动物，敌对的动物，甚至是小BOSS。
更好的动物加添加了各种动物给玩家创造了一个沉浸式的游戏体验。


内容
官方解说视频：无法生成，点击跳转观看。https://youtu.be/pcXTKW_vRjo


动物，怪物，物品和头颅添加
和平动物鹿鹿灵野鸡驯鹿松鼠夜莺

中性动物黑熊棕熊狐狸山羊水母獾

敌对动物棕熊/灰熊土狼野狼公猪

怪物
狼蛛鹿灵（小BOSS）七鳃鳗（吸血鱼）

物品命运之手鹿头狼头狐头驯鹿头公猪头延龄草[鹿灵头
物品鹿角山羊奶酪山羊奶鹿灵头(可穿戴)熟野鸡肉生野鸡肉熟鹿肉生鹿肉



MOD语言
阿拉伯文德文世界语（？这个厉害？）英语西班牙法语日文葡萄牙语俄文中文(繁体)中文(简体)匈牙利语


常见问题及驯化方式
我能/如何驯服这些动物？鹿灵：骨头(随时)原野野兔(白天)狐狸：生鸡还是生兔(任何时候)野狼：骨头(任何时候，都必须佩末影龙头或鹿灵头)山羊：从传统意义上说，山羊是不可驯服的(攻击它会引起它的报复！)但是给它喂食任何种类的动物食物(小麦，胡萝卜，苹果等等)会让它成为你的“朋友”，如果你受到攻击，它会保护你。宿命之手有什么用？宿命之手是一块用来孕育鹿灵的石块，并用作照明。它可以用打火石点燃，用沙子或水桶灭火。我该怎么生成鹿灵?这个鹿灵[tr]很难在森林中找到，也可能是命运之手孕育出来的。如何利用命运之手孕育它：来自深层的菌类和鹿的遗骸；会召唤鹿灵从它的世界到这里。延龄草有啥用?延龄草作为一个装饰项目，就像游戏中的任何一朵花。我不能伤害鹿灵，它也不会攻击我，也不会变成鬼鹿灵？鹿灵只会在夜间攻击。如果您使用的是1.0.0版本，并且不会在夜间发生，请将其更新为1.1.0或设置为晚上来搞这些事情。
我怎么做山羊奶酪？山羊奶酪可以通过使用一桶山羊奶(在生存模式下使用一桶山羊奶)和任何形状的蘑菇(红色或棕色)来制作。然后，你将得到三个山羊奶酪。
动物图片

最后：虽然这个MOD动物种类还不够多，但是后续作者会持续开发，我也会持续搬运。第一次搬运贴，希望大家多多支持，有任何问题，可以在此反馈，我会反馈给作者，帮助他优化此MOD.
更新日志6.0.3[tr]Fixed random crash killing tameable animals[tr]Fixed desync of taming item config for servers and clients
6.0.2[tr]Added configuration for taming items[tr]Fixed milk bucket not being returned (again)[tr]Fixed crashes caused by animal heads[tr]Fixed taming items that are replaced by mods not working even though they match[tr]Fixed some broken loot tables[tr]Lamprey now drop fish[tr]Lamprey no longer spawn in the ocean by default (please re-generate configs for this)[tr]Lamprey now wander when not attacking[tr]Updated French Translation (Thanks to @Neerwan on GitHub)
6.0.1[tr]Fix crash from Lamprey moving (unknown cause)[tr]Fix invalid lang key on Hirschgeist daytime attack message
6.0.0[tr]Added Badgers[tr]Added Lampreys[tr]Added Songbirds[tr]Trillium now match biome grass color[tr]Lammergeiers have new animations[tr]Deer are breedable (wheat)[tr]Tamed Fox are breedable (raw rabbit or chicken)[tr]Hand of Fate has breaking progress and a nicer bounding box[tr]Deer no longer run without a single leg on the ground[tr]Deer will eat grass[tr]Goats will eat grass[tr]Lammergeiers will now land on the ground before sitting[tr]Fix some translations that were not working[tr]Fixed bug with deer drops/loot table causing it to not exist or not drop[tr]Fixed crashes with DataManager keys on Jellyfish[tr]Fixed heads with corrupted or invalid NBT data causing client to crash[tr]Fixed doSpawning config option doing nothing[tr]Fixed deer head icons not matching their antlers[tr]Removed doRegister from config[tr]Added config option to make coyotes always hostile[tr]Coyotes can now be tamed with cooked or raw chicken, rabbit, and pheasant as opposed to just raw rabbit.[tr]Code refactors (as usual) that make development easier
5.0.2[tr]Fix bug that caused modded biomes to be unable to spawn BA+ entities and made the configuration unable to affect it
5.0.1[tr]Fix random crash on client when loading chunks with Trillium or Hand of Fate, where the TE loads before the block.
5.0.0[tr]Added Boars[tr]Added Squirrels[tr]Added Boar heads[tr]Animal head items have textures for each variant[tr]Spawn eggs now show in the Better Animals Plus tab[tr]Added biomes configuration for spawning[tr]Fixed jellyfish floating/being too large[tr]Fixed reindeer neck rotating strangely when eating[tr]Fixed lammergeiers derping before attacking ("hesitating")[tr]Fixed minor offsets on resting leg models (should prevent feet half clipping into the ground or being angled)[tr]Fixed Esperanto translation[tr]Fixed some random crashes with Entity datamanager (may still afflict old worlds with older entities, try removing mod, loading world, and re-adding mod)[tr]Redo render factory system (use method references)[tr]Removed the useless "Common Proxy"
4.1.0[tr]Fixed bug where animal heads would not drop their item after being broken by external sources (like water)[tr]Added config options to disable natural spawning instead of removing entities alltogether[tr]Rewrote configuration / entity registration system to add more options (min, max) and categorize entities[tr]Lowered Coyote and Goat spawnrates slightly[tr]Increase size of deer hitbox by 0.2 blocks[tr]Coyotes no longer growl while tamed (unless attacking) and don't bark[tr]Tamed feral wolves will growl when attacking[tr]Foxes will not bark[tr]Fixed bug where HOF recipe was stuck on last oredict for stone[tr]The wearable Hirschgeist skull can now be repaired with bones and antlers[tr]Breaking and replacing wolf, deer, or reindeer skull will no longer pick a new variant, but instead persists through the item[tr]Wolves, deer, and reindeer will drop heads that match their skins[tr]Drop rate of heads greatly reduced[tr]Increased goat health[tr]Lammergeier now accepts any food for healing[tr]Fixed incorrect translation for "fox" in Hungarian[tr]Added more oredictionary values for venison (listAllvenisonraw/cooked, foodVenisonraw/cooked) (Pam's HarvestCraft)[tr]Added fox head (also drops correctly and such)[tr]Updated all translations for new content except Arabic and Chinese[tr]Updated hirschgeist skull (wearable) model on head[tr]Fixed bug where the worn hirschgeist skull would render backwards in the inventory screen
4.0.1[tr]Added naming a reindeer "Rudolph" and fixed spawning logic for red-nosed versions[tr]Fixed crash with Wings, Horns, and Hooves (chaning internal lang layout)[tr]Fixed all the translations (big oops)
4.0.0[tr]Added reindeer[tr]Added reindeer head[tr]Fixed bug where wolf skulls didn't save their type[tr]Added both antler variants to the deer head[tr]Added baby deer[tr]Added Translation: Hungarian[tr]Updated Translations:[tr]German[tr]Esperanto[tr]English[tr]Spanish[tr]French[tr]Japanese[tr]Portuguese[tr]Russian
3.0.1[tr]Fixed Hand of Fate breaking bug[tr]Added a secret :D[tr]Updated Translations:[tr]German[tr]Esperanto[tr]English[tr]Spanish[tr]French[tr]Japanese[tr]Portuguese[tr]Russian
3.0.0[tr]Added jellyfish[tr]Added pheasant[tr]Added pheasant meat[tr]Fixed bug where bucket would not be returned when making goat cheese[tr]Adjusted spawn rates, fixed BIG spawning bug
2.0.0[tr]Add goat[tr]Add goat cheese[tr]Add goat milk[tr]Add wolf head (includes coyote)[tr]Add deer head[tr]Fix server crash with loading and unloading Trillium on servers[tr]Fix error in configuration where Hirschgeist spawn weight was named "weight"[tr]Fix pesky off center-ness with Hirschgeist skull[tr]Fixed drops and placement being wrong for Hirschgeist skull[tr]Feral Wolves attack goats[tr]Fixed some loot tables for mobs[tr]Fixed large deer hitbox[tr]Increased size of Wolf/Coyote/Fox hitbox[tr]Updated translations with new content:
